modules.title: Module 1: Prompt Engineering for Provocateurs
modules.description: Learn to craft prompts that don't just generate text, but create controversy, conversation, and clicks. This is where you master the machine's voice.
lessons: The Art of the 'Spicy' Seed Prompt

modules.title: Module 2: AI-Powered Visual Shock & Awe
modules.description: Text is only half the battle. Create jaw-dropping visuals, memes, and video concepts that stop the scroll and demand a reaction.
lessons: AI Video Shorts: From Script to Screen

modules.title: Module 3: Monetizing Your Digital Ghost
modules.description: Turn your edgy AI content into a reliable income stream. We cover everything from brand deals to digital products, tailored for the AI-native creator.

modules.title: Module 4: The Ethics of AI Influence
modules.description: With great power comes great responsibility. Learn to navigate the tricky ethical landscape of AI content, build trust, and create a sustainable brand.

testimonials.quote: I thought I knew AI. This course showed me the dark arts. My engagement is up 300% and I finally landed a brand deal that gets my vibe.
testimonials.name: Jenna "Glitched" Ortiz

testimonials.quote: The 'Prompt Engineering for Provocateurs' module alone was worth the price. I'm creating content I never thought possible. It's like a cheat code for creativity.
testimonials.name: Cody Banks

testimonials.quote: Forget boring, generic AI content. This course teaches you how to give your creations a soul... a spicy, slightly unhinged soul. 10/10 would recommend.
testimonials.name: Anya Petrova
